about_the_game:
Core Gameplay

Whether you’re growing your collection in the aquarium or keeping the sushi station running, it's all about enjoying a peaceful rhythm. The serene setting and charming pixel visuals make this an experience you can truly unwind with.

Aesthetic Experience

Enjoy an aesthetic experience designed to fit perfectly into any screen border and orientation: play along the side, top, or bottom, and let the game adapt to your day. Cast your line, reel in a variety of colorful fish, and decide how to use your catch: keep them in your aquarium or turn them into fresh sushi for profit.

Fish Collection

Fish come in different sizes and rarities! Place your catch in luxurious aquariums, to grow them and build your fish empire!

Fish List

This simple but satisfying management system keeps your raft running smoothly while adding depth to your decisions. The serene setting and charming pixel visuals make this an experience you can truly unwind with.

  • Widescreen Compatibility & Monitor Flexibility: Play the game in widescreen mode or switch it to any monitor easily. Whether it's at the top, bottom, left, or right of your screen, the game seamlessly adapts to fit into your preferred setup for maximum comfort.

  • Fish Tank View: Dive into the dedicated fish tank view, where you can watch your fish swim around in a peaceful setting. Select and manage your fish directly, choosing which to keep, sell, or turn into sushi—all while enjoying the relaxing sight of your collection. This view adds an extra layer of calm as you curate and care for your aquatic friends.

  • Relaxing Idle Fishing: Cast your line from the comfort of your raft, catch fish, and enjoy the laid-back pace.

  • Aquarium Management: Collect and care for different types of fish, earning income as they swim happily.

  • Sushi Station: Turn your catch into sushi and keep your factory buzzing to increase profits.

  • Charming Pixel Art: Beautifully illustrated in retro style to make every part of your raft a joy to look at.

  • Fits Your Day: The game takes up a small corner of your screen, perfect for playing while you do other things.

name: Little Fishing Idle

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: i3 4170 or equivalent
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 4400 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or 11
  • Processor: Intel core i5 (4 cores), AMD Ryzen 5 or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 520 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: Cozy up with an idle fishing and sushi-making adventure on a peaceful raft. Relax, catch fish, and enjoy the game's company as you go about your day.
